executable.title: Mapped FE Registration
executable.description: This program generates a hexahedral mesh for the given suject surface from template meshes using FE based deformable registration technique. The program uses ITKFEM framework and has been made hierarchical so that multiple levels of mesh refinement can be used.
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Nicole Grosland, Vincent Magnotta, and Ritesh Bafna. It was developed as part of an NIH NA-MIC Collaboration Grant EB005973.
executable.acknowledgements: This command module was developed as part of an NIH NA-MIC Collaboration Grant EB005973.

parameters.label: Meshing Input Files
parameters.description: Subject Surface file to be Meshed

parameters.label: Template Mesh Input Files
parameters.description: Template Meshes to be used for Meshing

string-vector.name: TemplateMeshFileNames
string-vector.description: Templater Mesh File Names to be used for the registration
string-vector.label: Template Mesh(es)

parameters.label: FE Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for generation of the Hexahedral mesh

integer.name: numRefinementLevels
integer.description: Nmber of Mesh Refinement Levels to be used
integer.label: Number of Mesh Refinment Levels

integer-vector.name: numIterations
integer-vector.description: Maximum number of iterations at each mesh refinement level
integer-vector.label: Number of Iterations

boolean.name: applyCenterBoundaryConditions
boolean.description: Flag to apply boundary conditions at the center of the mesh
boolean.label: Apply Center Boundary Conditions

double.name: tolerance
double.description: Distance tolerance for applying FE loads
double.label: Distance Tolerance

boolean.name: distanceAlongNormals
boolean.description: Calculate distance to subject surface using normal surface intersecion instead of closest point
boolean.label: Compute Distance Along Normal

boolean.name: useExternalBoundaryConditions
boolean.description: Apply boundary conditions to vertices that are within the distance specified by tolerance. The default value is off, and no load is applied to the point.
boolean.label: Use External Boundary Conditions

executable.parameters:
ICP Parameters Parameters for initial registration
initialTransform initialTransform Initialization transform to be used for the FE registration Initial Transform None None ICP Procrustes
numberOfIcpIterations icpIterations Number of Iterations for Iterative Closest Point Registration Num of Iterations for ICP 1000 terations
numberOfLandmarks numberOfLandmarks Maximum number of landmarks for Iterative Closest Point Registration Num of Landmarks for ICP 10000
maxMeanDistanace maxMeanDistanace Max Mean dist for ICP Max Mean Distance 0.001

parameters.label: TPS Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for Thin Plate Spline registration

integer.name: PointRatio
integer.description: Fraction of points to be considered for Thin Plate Spline
integer.label: Point Ratio for TPS
